messages.body:
Received: from   




My Dear    
 
I AM WRITING THIS MAIL TO YOU IN GOOD FAITH,MY NAME IS MR.GARRY BOOKER FROM NEW ZEALAND.  
 
I USED TO WORK WITH SHELL PETROLEUM ,NIGERIA WHERE I AM PRESENTLY UNDERGOING TREATMENT AND WAS ALSO A MAJOR INVESTOR IN OFFSHORE OIL RIGGS UNTIL RECENTLY WHEN I WAS CRIPPLED BY STROKE WHICH LEFT HALF PART OF MY BODY PARALYSED AND ALSO I HAD UNDERGONE EXTENSIVE EYE SURGERY WHICH HAS RESULTED INTO POOR VISION. 
FOR THE PAST FIFTEEN YEARS I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR A MIRACLE,A SPIRITUAL CURE ALL TO NO AVAIL.
RECENTLY MY DOCTOR GAVE ME VERY BAD NEWS WHICH IS VERY DISTURBING TO MY EARS,HE SAID THAT IN ABOUT THREE MONTHS TIME THAT I WILL  DIE OF MY ILLNESS,I HAVE NO CLOSE RELATIVE AROND AND THE ONLY ONE I HAVE WHICH HAPPENS TO BE A DISTANT COUSIN OF MINE MRS LINDA LEFLER LEFT FOR AUSTRALIA 10 YEARS AGO AND SINCE THEN I HAVENT SEEN HER NEITHER DO I HAVE HER POSTAL ADDRESS.  
 
I HAVE SURRENDERED MY LIFE TO GOD AND I AM NOW A BORN AGAIN,I WANT TO DO A GOOD DEED BEFORE I DEPART HENCE MY CONTACTING YOU.
   
I WILL WANT TO SET UP ORPHANAGES IN MY NAME AND ALSO DONATE THE REST OF MY WEALTH TO THE MISSIONARY OR CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS AND FOR THE NEEDY SINCE THE WEALTH WOULD NOT BE USEFULL FOR ME WHEN I AM GONE.I AM SEEKING FOR WHO WOULD BE WILLING TO DILLIGENTLY CARRY OUT THIS WILL OF GOD FOR ME WHICH IS THE REASON I AM CONTACTING.  
 
MY ACCOUNT BALANCE PRESENTLY TOTALLING $46,828,645.67 AS WAS REFLECTED IN MY LAST STATEMENT ACCOUNT FROM MY BANK ACCOUNT I HAVE IN THE BANK AND I HAVE WISH TO USE THIS FUND TO FINANCE THIS PROJECT AS I DO NOT HAVE MUCH TIME LEFT,YOU WILL BE ENTITLED TO 24% OF
THESE FUNDS FOR YOUR GOOD WORK AND PUT THE INTO THE CHURCH AND CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS,  
 
WHAT WILL BE REQUIRED OF YOU IS TO MAKE CONTACT WITH THE BANK FOR THESE FUNDS TO BE TRANSFERED BUT THE FIRST THING I WILL REQUIRE FROM YOU IS TO GIVE YOUR LIFE TO GOD,RIGHT NOW I AM CONFINED TO AN AUTOMATED WHEEL CHAIR IN THE TEACHING HOSPITAL AND THE INTERNET IS THE ONLY MEANS I HAVE IN COMMUNICATING WITH THE OUTSIDE WORLD.I PRESUME THAT YOU ARE THE RIGHT PERSON TO MEET REGARDING SUCH ISSUE AS I DO NOT KNOW WHETHER TO GO TO ANOTHER PARTY,PLEASE SEND ME A MAIL IF YOU ARE WILLING TO ASSIST ME ON THIS AND ALSO INCLUDE YOUR CELLPHONE,PHONE AND FAX NUMBERS TO ENABLE MYSEF CALL YOU WITH THE ASSISTANCE OF THE NURSE HERE WHO HAS BEEN KIND ENOUGH TO ASSIST ME,I WANT YOU TO SEND YOUR RESPONSE AS I AM EAGERLY EXPECTING YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE TO MY MAIL.  
 
AS SOON AS I RECIEVE A RESPONSE FROM YOU I SHALL SEND A CHEQUE FROM MY HOSPITAL OF MY FUNDS TO MY BANK TO TRANSFER EVERY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THS FUND OVER TO YOU INCLUDING ALL LEGAL DOCUMENTS FOR ONWARD TRANSFER TO YOUR ACCOUNT SO THAT YOU CAN COMMENCE ON THIS WORKOF GOD FOR ME AS I AM DISABLED AND WILL NOT BE ABLE TO MOVE AROUND AND DO MUCH.  
 
YOU CAN ALSO SEND ME A POST THROUGH MY ADDRESS BELOW.I AM PRSENTLY VERY ILL AND WILL REALLY APPRECIATE IT FOR YOU TO CALL ME ON 234-1-2206719,  
 
I AM BY MY BEDSIDE AND WILL BE AWAITING YOUR CALL. 
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING 
REMAIN BLESSED 
MR.GARRY BOOKER

messages.body:
Dear Mr Booker

You have indeed struck lucky and as you have found a brother in faith and we can most certainly help you. I am curious though why you would wish to keep such a large amount of the money for yourself with such a short time to live. We could do much good work for you with the whole balance. We are in the process of starting a new foundation at our resort and would be delighted to name the building after you, The Garry Bookey Building. Please let me know what I need to do  

Remain Blessed and Swinging
 
Brother Mark Knopfler
Church of the Sultans of Swing
Visit our Resort http://www.churchofthesultansofswing.site40.net

messages.body:
Dear Gary  

I didn't see your other mail before I replied to your last one. Please accept my humble merkins. I can see that you are definitely under the weather as your spelling is simply appalling.
  
stution - I assume you are meaning SITUATION 
accout - Account? 
thiat - That? 
goreigner - Foreigner perhaps? 
drotor - not sure... could be Doctor? 
immdiately - Immediately? 
intuch - In Touch?  

I hope that your spelling improves with your health. I will contact the bank. However, all you have said is to contact the bank and ask them what to do. Im sure in your poorly state you are of feeble mind you have simply neglected to give me the information I am surely going to need. I can hardly email a bank and say, "tell me what to do". They wont know who I am or why I am contacting them. If you can struggle back to your computer and give me this information then I can start the ball rolling as I really want to ensure you get everything you deserve in this life, and the next  

Remain Blessed and Swinging

Brother Mark Knopfler
Church of the Sultans of Swing
Visit our Resort http://www.churchofthesultansofswing.site40.net

Dear Gaz

I have contacted the bank as you have intimated and emailed Dr Lemon requesting further instructions. You may be pleased to know that the new recording studio on the resort has been completed. We played last night until we had stiff little fingers. The sound was a clash of noise. I didn't know whether to stay or go to be honest as my home, London, was calling as I have not been there for a while. It is full of cockney rejects and hersham boys so my mind is all in a dither. What would you suggest? As someone who is not in their own country as I am, would you not prefer to return home to get some bungee jumping in before you journey into the great yonder that is the afterlife?

ALLOCATION NO: CBN001/FGN/VOL1
SEQUENCE NO: FGNMS3/NNPCXXX/CCD
DELIVERY CODE: CSB77/1000M/CODE3
DELIVERY ANALYSIS NO: SSXXCM110
 
I herey writting to you for legal provisions based on the instruction received from the Office Of The Accountant General Of The Federation today being 9th/09/2008.

We are in response to the delivery instruction given by the above offices to you in line with the signing of the transfer release order documents on your behalf that will enable the us to wire your funds as instructed by Mr.Garry Booker The Original Beneficiary of the said funds.. We have also been briefed by the Office Of The Presidency on the importance of time.
 
 WHICH WILL ACERTAIN THE AUTHENTIFICATION OF YOUR CLAIMS AND AFTER WHICH THE FUNDS WILL BE WIRED  TO YOU ONCE DOCUMENTS IS BEING ISSUED TO US BY WEDNESDAY THIS  WEEK BEING 10TH SEPTEMBER 2008 ..IN LINE WITH THIS,THE DOCUMENTS ARE COPIES MADE FOR SIGNATORIES OF BENEFICIARY TO AVOID ANY FURTHER CLAIM FROM ANY BODY AFTER PAYMENT, ALSO TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE THE RIGHTFUL PERSON AUTHORISED FOR THE RELEASE OF THE FUNDS . IN QUOTE ALL THIS PROTOCOLS ARE BEEN OBSERVED FOR GENUE CLAIMS AND PROOF.
 
Also all necessary profile details of yours have been forwarded to them by the our humble selves .However, according to your request for us to sign the transfer release order documents, note that the legalization will be done within two working days. We will do everything within our powers to put in consideration your limited time frame thereby expediating all actions in legalizing and signing the documents in a timely manner. 
 
The following are the proceedural steps/requirements needed for the earliest signing of the documents with the  Apex Bank rules and regulations. 
 
Upon the receipt of the approval notice from the ministries, an appointment date will be given to us for the transfer . 
 
We needed the copies of your identification documents like driver's licence that will aid us in obtaining the required certificates from the ministries authenticating your claims and the notary/stamp fees paid, the clearance legalization letter will be issued to us by the regulatory Ministries.
 
The following mandatory payments need to be effected by you to the ministry to ensure earliest issuance of the clearance that will aid the Federal Minstry Of Finance (FMF)allow us to sign the documents on your behalf.
 
 Payment of 750 British Pound Sterling only (Seven hundred and fifty british pound sterlings only )representing the non refundable deposit for the registration forms to be paid to the  Ministry Of Justice.
 
Payment of 200.00 BGP only ( Two Hundred british pound sterling only) representing the stamp fee to the Ministry.
 
Payment of 350.00 (Three hundred and fifty british pound sterling only) is for the insurance coverage, is representing our legal/service charges. 
 
The total amount is 1,250.00(ONE THOUSAND TWO AND FIFTY BGP ONLY). 
 
Note: that without this payment, we are completely incapacitated in doing anything towards the signing of the transfer release bond,NNPC PERFORMANCE RE-VALIDATION CERTIFICATE/CONTRACT COMPLETION CERTIFICATE/ CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION,AND TWO OTHER CERTIFICATES  that we enable the bank to wire  your fund. You are therefore advised to effect this payment immediately without delay. 
 
Payment should make via western union money transfer or money gram and Send respectively to my EMEKA MORDI .. 

Receiver's Name: EMEKA MORDI  
Address: NIGERIA
Text Question: WHAT FOR
Text Answer: FINAL CLEARANCE
AMOUNT :1,250.00 BGP
 
Sender's Address/Name is needed for proper confirmations.
Upon the completion of the Harmonization Process/Finacle Core being validated,wire transfer proof will be forward to you.
 
Mr.Tunde Lemo.

Dear Dr Uba

I have been conversing with Garry for some time and I understand he is on his last legs and shortly to depart this world. The Church of the Sultans of Swing would like to make a contribution to your good selves for his treatment and to allow you to buy the things that you really need.
